## Problem

A clear description of the problem or limitation you are experiencing.

## Proposed Solution

Describe the feature or change you would like to see.

## Example Usage

Show how the feature would be used from the command line:

```bash
jwt-term <new-command-or-flag> ...
```

## Alternatives Considered

Describe any alternative solutions or workarounds you have considered.

## Additional Context

Add any other context, mockups, or references here.
